verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from <S%H4480>Naioth<s%> <S%H5121><s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have I <S%H6213>done?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is mine <S%H5771>iniquity?<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> is my <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thy <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5315>life?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, God <S%H2486>forbid;<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> either <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6996>small,<s%> but that he will <S%H3808>show<s%> <S%H1540><s%> <S%H853>it<s%> <S%H241>me:<s%> and <S%H4069>why<s%> should my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me? <S%H2063>it<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> so.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> <S%H5750>moreover,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Thy <S%H1>father<s%> certainly <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> and he <S%H559>saith,<s%> Let <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he be <S%H6087>grieved:<s%> but <S%H199>truly<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> and as thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H3588>there<s%> is but a <S%H6587>step<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4100>Whatsoever<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H559>desireth,<s%> I will even <S%H6213>do<s%> it for thee.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> is the new <S%H2320>moon,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> should not fail to <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H3427><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H398>meat:<s%> but let me <S%H7971>go,<s%> that I may hide <S%H5641>myself<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> day at <S%H6153>even.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> at all <S%H6485>miss<s%> <S%H6485><s%> me, then <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> earnestly <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H7592><s%> leave <S%H4480>of<s%> me that he might <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> his <S%H5892>city:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there is a <S%H3117>yearly<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>family.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> he <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus,<s%> It is <S%H2896>well;<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall have <S%H7965>peace:<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> he be very <S%H2734>wroth,<s%> <S%H2734><s%> then be <S%H3045>sure<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H3615>determined<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> <S%H5973><s%> him.

Therefore thou shalt <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> into a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee: notwithstanding, <S%H518>if<s%> there <S%H3426>be<s%> in me <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H4191>slay<s%> me <S%H859>thyself;<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> shouldest thou <S%H935>bring<s%> me to thy <S%H1>father?<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Far be <S%H2486>it<s%> from thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I knew <S%H3045>certainly<s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> were <S%H3615>determined<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> <S%H5973><s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, then would <S%H3808>not<s%> I <S%H5046>tell<s%> it thee?

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> me? <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> if thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> thee <S%H7186>roughly?<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and let us go <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field.<s%> And they went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them into the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I have <S%H2713>sounded<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> about <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> any <S%H6256>time,<s%> or the <S%H7992>third<s%> day, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if there be <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and I <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, and show it <S%H1540>thee;<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H241><s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> and <S%H3541>much<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> to <S%H3083>Jonathan:<s%> but <S%H3588>if<s%> it <S%H3190>please<s%> <S%H413><s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to do <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> then I will show it <S%H1540>thee,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H241><s%> and send thee <S%H7971>away,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H1980>go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> my <S%H1>father.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> only <S%H518>while<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> I <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H5973><s%> me the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I <S%H4191>die<s%> not: <S%H3808><s%>

But also thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5704>forever:<s%> <S%H5769><s%> no, <S%H3808>not<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> from the <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

So <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> saying, Let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> even <S%H1245>require<s%> it at the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H853>caused<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H3254>again,<s%> because he <S%H160>loved<s%> him: <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H157>loved<s%> him as he <S%H160>loved<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Then <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to David, <S%H4279>Tomorrow<s%> is the new <S%H2320>moon:<s%> and thou shalt be <S%H6485>missed,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thy <S%H4186>seat<s%> will be <S%H6485>empty.<s%>

And when thou hast stayed three <S%H8027>days,<s%> then thou shalt go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3966>quickly,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> thou didst hide <S%H5641>thyself<s%> <S%H8033>when<s%> <S%H3117><s%> the <S%H4639>business<s%> was in hand, and shalt <S%H3427>remain<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H237>Ezel.<s%>
And <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H3384>shoot<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> on the <S%H6654>side<s%> thereof, as though I <S%H7971>shot<s%> at a <S%H4307>mark.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H5288>lad,<s%> saying, <S%H1980>Go,<s%> find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2671>arrows.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I expressly <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H559><s%> unto the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are on this <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H2008><s%> of thee, <S%H3947>take<s%> them; then <S%H935>come<s%> thou: <S%H3588>for<s%> there is <S%H7965>peace<s%> to thee, and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1697>hurt;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> unto the young <S%H5958>man,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H1973><s%> thee; go thy <S%H1980>way:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath sent thee <S%H7971>away.<s%>

And as touching the <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H996>between<s%> thee and me <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> hid <S%H5641>himself<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and when the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> was <S%H1961>come,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> sat him <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>meat.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H4186>seat,<s%> as at other <S%H6471>times,<s%> <S%H6471><s%> even <S%H413>upon<s%> a <S%H4186>seat<s%> by the <S%H7023>wall:<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> by <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6654><s%> and <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H6485>empty.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> any <S%H3972>thing<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H559>thought,<s%> Something hath <S%H4745>befallen<s%> him, <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H2889>clean;<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> he is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow,<s%> <S%H4283><s%> which was the <S%H8145>second<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H6485>empty:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4069>Wherefore<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3899>meat,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H8543>yesterday,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> <S%H3117>today?<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> earnestly <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H7592><s%> leave <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> me to go <S%H5704>to<s%> Bethlehem: <S%H1035><s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me <S%H7971>go,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> our <S%H4940>family<s%> hath a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and my <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me to be there: and <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> let me get <S%H4422>away,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H251>brethren.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H7979>table.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H5753>perverse<s%> <S%H4780>rebellious<s%> woman, do <S%H3808>not<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H977>chosen<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> to thine own <S%H1322>confusion,<s%> and unto the <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness?<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> as <S%H3605>long<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H127>ground,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3559>established,<s%> nor thy <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%> Wherefore <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H853><s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall surely <S%H1121>die.<s%> <S%H4194><s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> shall he be <S%H4191>slain?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> hath he <S%H6213>done?<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H2904>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H2595>javelin<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> him to <S%H5221>smite<s%> him: whereby <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H3615>determined<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

So <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> in <S%H2750>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>meat<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he was <S%H6087>grieved<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had done him <S%H3637>shame.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%> at the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> with <S%H1732>David,<s%> and a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5288>lad,<s%> <S%H7323>Run,<s%> find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3384>shoot.<s%> And as the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3384>shot<s%> an <S%H2678>arrow<s%> <S%H5674>beyond<s%> him.

And when the <S%H5288>lad<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H2678>arrow<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> had <S%H3384>shot,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H2678>arrow<s%> <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H1973><s%> thee?
